subclassFeatures.name: The Fading Light Domain
entries: As stated in the Glooming Letters, sometimes darkness must be fought with darkness and lies with lies.
At each indicated cleric level, you add the listed spells to your spells prepared.

entries.name: Eyes of the Shadow
entries: Alasia's light is strong, and so are the shadows it creates

Your eyes are used to the shadows, allowing you to see through darkness. You have darkvision with a range of 60 feet; you see in dim light as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light and see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical.

entries.name: White Lies
entries: Also at 1st level, you are proficient with the {@skill deception} skill and learn the {@spell vicious mockery} cantrip.

entries.name: Channel Divinity: Obscurity
entries: As an action, you present your holy symbol and become {@condition invisible} for 1 minute or until you attack. If you are in dim light or darkness, {@skill perception} checks to locate you are made with disadvantage. You add twice your proficiency bonus to damage rolls on your next attack that hits.

entries.name: Sight of the light
entries: You have learnt how to viciously use lies to put creatures at unease.
At 6th level, your damage dice for the {@spell vicious mockery} cantrip are now d6 instead of d4. Additionally, you have advantage on your next attack against creatures that fail the saving throw.

entries.name: Potent spellcasting
entries: Starting at 8th level, you add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

entries.name: Shroud of Lies
entries: As a bonus action, you can extinguish any source of light within 60 feet of you. You gain temporary hit points equal to five times the number of sources you have extinguished (maximum 20). And {@dice 1d6} radiant damage dice.
